hypothesis_content.title: Liquidity Gap Reversal After News-Driven Spikes
hypothesis_content.statement: Following major macro news events (rate decisions, regulatory announcements), initial liquidity gaps in BTC/USDT pairs >2% from VWAP will revert within 2 hours when overall market regime remains NEUTRAL, creating profitable mean-reversion opportunities.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Recent Japan rate news created exaggerated moves that partially reversed. In NEUTRAL regimes, market makers and algorithmic liquidity providers systematically fill temporary gaps when no fundamental regime change occurs. The October liquidity crash may have made participants more sensitive to overreactions.
entry_conditions: BTC price deviates >2% from 30-min VWAP within 30 minutes of major news
Order book shows bid-ask spread >0.15% (indicating temporary liquidity vacuum)
Cumulative volume delta (CVD) shows net selling >$50M on spike up OR net buying >$50M on spike down
Market regime remains NEUTRAL (confidence >55%) throughout event

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price returns to within 0.5% of pre-spike VWAP
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Deviation extends beyond 3.5% from entry VWAP

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If >60% of such events lead to continuation rather than reversion over next 4 hours when tested on 2024-2025 data.
